title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.5 - Admission to events
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.5 - Admission to events

State Regulations

No person shall be admitted to any contest or exhibition
unless he or she holds a ticket of admission, with the exception of: (a) members of the Commission; (b) people designated by the Commission for
official duty; (c) officials
required to attend under provisions of State laws or the Commission's
rules; (d) promoters, combatants, managers and seconds who are involved in the contests or exhibitions; and
(e) police officers, firefighters, medical personnel, public officials, credentialed press, broadcast teams, and venue staff actually on duty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

ยง
210.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
